PROFILE.TITLE: What's Your Profile?
PROFILE.DESCRIPTION: Please choose the profile that best describes you.

GET_STARTED.TITLE: Get Started
GET_STARTED.DESCRIPTION: Just a few simple questions to get you started.
GET_STARTED.DEPENDANT_MEANING_DESC: Children, Parents, Spouse, Siblings that I'm supporting

PROTECTION_NEEDS.TITLE: Protection Needs
PROTECTION_NEEDS.DESCRIPTION: Here are the protection type(s) recommended for you. Uncheck those that are not a priority.
PROTECTION_NEEDS.BOTTOM_INFO: We'll guide you through these needs when you tap 'continue'

MY_INCOME.TITLE: My Income
MY_INCOME.DESCRIPTION: Help us understand your finances better.

MY_EXPENSES.TITLE: My Expenses
MY_EXPENSES.DESCRIPTION: Help us understand your finances better.

MY_ASSETS.TITLE: My Assets
MY_ASSETS.DESCRIPTION: Help us understand your finances better.

MY_LIABILITIES.TITLE: My Liabilities
MY_LIABILITIES.DESCRIPTION: Help us understand your finances better.

FINANCIAL_ASSESSMENT.TITLE: Financial Assessment
FINANCIAL_ASSESSMENT.CONTENT_DESC: In the next step, we are going to gather information on your income, expenses, assets and liabilities to determine your insurance needs.

INSURE_ASSESSMENT.TITLE: Insurance Needs Assessment
INSURE_ASSESSMENT.CONTENT_DESC: In the next step, we will ask you a few simple questions to assess your needs.

LIFE_PROTECTION.TITLE: Life Protection
LIFE_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION: If you have dependants to support, this coverage is important as it helps cover their living expenses when you are no longer around. This coverage could also fund your child’s university education.
LIFE_PROTECTION.SUPPORT_AMOUNT_MESSAGE: This refers to the amount you require to support this dependant on a monthly basis.
LIFE_PROTECTION.EDUCATION_SUPPORT_DESC: I want to fund this child for a university education if i pass away
LIFE_PROTECTION.YEARS_MODAL_DESC: Click on your dependant’s profile type for a general guideline on the years needed.

YEARS_NEEDED.message: Years Needed = Child’s Age of Starting Work – Child’s Current Age

MODAL_DATA.title: Life Protection
MODAL_DATA.description:
Life Protection

If you have dependants to support, this coverage is important as it helps cover their living expenses when you are no longer around. This coverage could also fund your child’s university education.

CI_ASSESSMENT.TITLE: Critical Illness
CI_ASSESSMENT.DESCRIPTION: This coverage replaces your income during recovery period (about 2-5 years) while you are unable to work. A person usually requires Critical Illness coverage till their intended retirement age.

OCP_DISABILITY.TITLE: Occupational Disability
OCP_DISABILITY.DESCRIPTION: This coverage is especially crucial in the early to mid-phase of work life as any disability affecting your ability to work would drastically affect your goal to be financially independent.

MODAL_DATA.title: Occupational Disability
MODAL_DATA.description:
Occupational Disability

This is especially crucial in the early to mid-phase of work life as any disability affecting your ability to work would drastically affect your goal to be financially independent.

LTC_ASSESSMENT.TITLE: Long Term Care
LTC_ASSESSMENT.SUB_TITLE: Select the type of caregiver that you prefer.
LTC_ASSESSMENT.DESCRIPTION_PART1: If one is unable to perform at least
LTC_ASSESSMENT.DESCRIPTION_BOLD: 3 of these activities (washing, feeding, dressing, toileting, mobility and transferring)
LTC_ASSESSMENT.DESCRIPTION_PART2: , he or she is considered severely disabled and would need Long-Term Care with the help of a caregiver. Select the type of caregiver that you prefer.

MODAL_DATA.TITLE: Long-Term Care
MODAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION: If one is unable to perform at least 3 of the below activities, he or she is considered severely disabled and would need Long-Term Care with the help of a caregiver.

HOSPITAL_PLAN.TITLE: Hospital Plan
HOSPITAL_PLAN.SUB_TITLE: Select the type of hospital plan that you prefer.
HOSPITAL_PLAN.DESCRIPTION: Select the type of hospital plan that you prefer.

INSURANCE_RESULTS.TITLE: Insurance Results
INSURANCE_RESULTS.STATIC_DESCRIPTION: In the final step, we will be sharing with you the coverage you need based on our assessment

ADD_COVERAGE.LBL: Add Existing Coverage For More Accurate Result

GETSTARTED_STEP1.TITLE: Step 1
GETSTARTED_STEP1.CAPTION: Get Started
GETSTARTED_STEP1.DESCRIPTION: In the next step,we are going to assess your ability to take risk

PERSONAL_INFO.TITLE: Get Started
PERSONAL_INFO.SELECT_INVESTMENT_DESC: Drag the slider to select the number of years you want to invest for.

GETSTARTED_STEP2.TITLE: Step 2
GETSTARTED_STEP2.CAPTION: Assess Your Risk
GETSTARTED_STEP2.DESCRIPTION: In the next step,we will assess your willingness to take risk

MY_FINANCIALS.TITLE: Get Started

modalData.modalMessage: Before you invest, we recommend that you have an emergency fund to cover at least 3 months’ of living expenses.

heplDate.modalMessage: Emergency fund is money that must be set aside to cover your living expenses for a period of at least 3 months.

MY_FINANCIALS.QUESTATION: Do you have at least 3 months’ worth of Emergency Fund?

PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.TITLE: portfoli Recommendation
PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.MODAL_DESC: In the next step, we will be showing you the recommended portfolio that is most suited to your profile.

helpDate.modalMessage: This is an estimated percentage of gains that the portfolio will achieve. Do note that it is not guaranteed and the actual returns will depend on the actual performance of each asset.

editModel.modalMessage: To make changes to your portfolio, you need to reassess your risk. Are you sure you want to continue?
